body:
Why is Avicus TeamSpeak dead ;(

Like there's barely anyone on anymore.
body_tagged:
Why is Avicus TeamSpeak dead ;(

Like there's barely anyone on anymore.
title: Avicus TeamSpeak

replies.body: Depends on your timezone sometimes but also it gets very popular on like the weekends :)
replies.body_tagged: Depends on your timezone sometimes but also it gets very popular on like the weekends :)

replies.body:
Because once they see you on Teamspeak, they all leave.

jkjk idk why.
replies.body_tagged:
Because once they see you on Teamspeak, they all leave.

jkjk idk why.

replies.body: I'm on it at the current moment if anyone's around. x) I know that there's a small bunch who hangs around in my timezone (Australian).
replies.body_tagged: I'm on it at the current moment if anyone's around. x) I know that there's a small bunch who hangs around in my timezone (Australian).

replies.body: Ikr, the numbers on ts have dropped.
replies.body_tagged: Ikr, the numbers on ts have dropped.

reply_to.body: Ikr, the numbers on ts have dropped.
reply_to.body_tagged: Ikr, the numbers on ts have dropped.

replies.body: Cause most of the people are online on weekends.
replies.body_tagged: Cause most of the people are online on weekends.

replies.body: Because all the active people who used to go on left.
replies.body_tagged: Because all the active people who used to go on left.

replies.body: I'm usually always on ts get on at like 8pm est that's when I see a lot of people on
replies.body_tagged: I'm usually always on ts get on at like 8pm est that's when I see a lot of people on

replies.body: I've been really busy with other things and I hope that we set up some type of advertisement system to get more people on.
replies.body_tagged: I've been really busy with other things and I hope that we set up some type of advertisement system to get more people on.

replies.body:
I definitely think we should promote it more.
It's an awesome way to meet and interact with the community and staff.
replies.body_tagged:
I definitely think we should promote it more.
It's an awesome way to meet and interact with the community and staff.

replies.body: And plus no mods ever want to do their job on the teamspeak when players are breaking the rules. That's why most of us use skype now since it's more in privacy as well. The old TS community was great, now it's almost dead.
replies.body_tagged: And plus no mods ever want to do their job on the teamspeak when players are breaking the rules. That's why most of us use skype now since it's more in privacy as well. The old TS community was great, now it's almost dead.

reply_to.body: Because all the active people who used to go on left.
reply_to.body_tagged: Because all the active people who used to go on left.

replies.body: All the people who used to be on TS are gone, also Emmaye If you feel privacy is an issue don't worry about it. I try being on TS 24/7 too moderate it, and tbh I do try my best. If you have a problem just poke me...
replies.body_tagged: All the people who used to be on TS are gone, also Emmaye If you feel privacy is an issue don't worry about it. I try being on TS 24/7 too moderate it, and tbh I do try my best. If you have a problem just poke me...

replies.body: If a Mod doesn't do their job, let me know.
replies.body_tagged: If a Mod doesn't do their job, let me know.

reply_to.body: And plus no mods ever want to do their job on the teamspeak when players are breaking the rules. That's why most of us use skype now since it's more in privacy as well. The old TS community was great, now it's almost dead.

replies.body: A lot of people prefer skype to communicate with people but not all.
replies.body_tagged: A lot of people prefer skype to communicate with people but not all.

replies.body: It's sad because I couldn't get to know the old TS users :'(
replies.body_tagged: It's sad because I couldn't get to know the old TS users :'(

replies.body: If ts gets a redesign and lets people make their own channels (delete on logout) thatd make me want to come back, idk tho
replies.body_tagged: If ts gets a redesign and lets people make their own channels (delete on logout) thatd make me want to come back, idk tho

replies.body: I'll be back by then so sure.
replies.body_tagged: I'll be back by then so sure.
